overview:
Ari Shomair began his online marketing career in 1996, performing web design and search engine optimization for SMBs. Most recently, he was Director of Marketing Optimization at Canada’s most awarded interactive advertising agency, responsible for ensuring search engine friendliness, accurate tracking implementations, and performance optimization on websites for many of the world’s largest brands, such as Coke, Kraft, Mercedes-Benz, Nintendo, Nestle, and Capital One.

Ari has also sat on numerous industry counsels, such as the Interactive Advertising Bureau’s search marketing council and the ComScore agency council, as well as spoken at numerous industry events, such as the Canadian Marketing Association’s digital marketing conference and the Search Engine Strategies conference.

image.attribution: Ari Shomair / Richard Ivey School of Business
